title: Context Chunk
description: The canonical schema for a single piece of context retrieved by the system.

source.description: The name of the data source this chunk came from (e.g., 'tasks', 'documents').

id.description: A unique identifier for the chunk, typically a combination of source and original ID.

content.description: The actual text content of the context chunk.

metadata.description: A flexible object containing metadata about the chunk.
